name: Retail Heroes
description:
You are a retail worker. Not enough appreciated as it is, but nowadays you got an even heavier workload. Fill up the shelves before one is completely empty! Your solidarity might not be appreciated by the panicking customers, but for sure by us.

(This game contains a few game... hindering bugs. We only found them after scrambling to submit in time - our team apologizes and hopes to change them as soon as possible.)
